effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 537,683.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 363 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Use: Command the Medichopper to attach to your target, absorbing 178,802 damage and granting them 1,299 versatility for 15 sec.

While attached, your healing spells have a chance to refuel the chopper, granting these bonuses to their host again. (2 Min Cooldown)
